content:
Welcome to the course. 
This course is intended to introduce you to Go programming, TDD with Go, conatinerization using Docker and Kubernetes, using CICD for your projects and using a Service Mesh for traffic management and observability.

Our first live session is scheduled for tomorrow at 9 PM.
Please use this link https://bit.ly/2YiKTYa to join the live.
Try to join 5 to 10 minutes early so we can chat a bit.
